name: RUINS Survival
detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Players will learn how to survive in the new world. Creating tools for survival fighting unpredictable wildlife, infected animals and people.

GENERAL FEATURE:

♦ Crafting;
♦ Online multiplayer PvE/PvP Sandbox;
♦ Day-Night cycle and dynamic weather;
♦ Ai (Infected creatures, animals);
♦ Stealth mechanics;
♦ Equipment and clothing system;
♦ Character Survival Status Mechanics (bleeding, wound, hunger, thirst);

DEV ROADMAP:

♦ Dynamic season system;
♦ Add more animals and more infected;
♦ Bulding system;
♦ Base control;
♦ Add NPC's;
♦ The main storyline;

short_description: RUINS Survival is a game in the genre of survival in the ruined world of the future. Players will struggle for survival with an unknown enemy, unpredictable wild world and other survivors.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In the game there are scenes of violence against fictional creatures such as animals killed for the purpose of obtaining food. Direct or indirect killing of fictional characters in order to protect and / or survive.
